When did he become so cool……! No, no, there's no way!

あの頃も、今も……変わらない気持ち。

いつの間にこんなにかっこy……! いやいや、ないない!

*

ただの可愛い弟みたいな幼なじみだと思っていたけれど、6年後の今は……。
付き合う前から付き合った後も、気づけばずっと
ドキドキさせられています。

Sentimentos daquela época que continuam inalterados...

Quando ele ficou tão legal...! Não, não, não tem como!

Requiem for Shinsen

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
description.pt-br: Em 1912, uma jovem mulher rastreia o idoso Nagakura Shinpachi, determinada a ouvir a verdadeira história do Demônio do Shinsengumi, o Vice-Comandante Hijikata Toshizou. A história de Hijikata começa em 1859, quando ele é um jovem violento que está aprimorando suas habilidades com a espada enquanto vende os remédios de sua família. Logo, em sua busca para encontrar pessoas mais fortes para lutar, Hijikata começa a entrar em contato com outros que eventualmente se tornarão seus companheiros no Shinsengumi. O primeiro a causar uma impressão no jovem impetuoso é Kondo Isami, que prova ser um lutador melhor do que Hijikata.

altTitles.en: The Lie Eater

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

description.ar: سيد بيرباز، الذي قاد الحرب التي استمرت 28 عامًا إلى النصر، "آشا بيرباز". بالنسبة لبيرفاز، الذي دمرته الحرب الطويلة، تتوجه آشا إلى العائلة الإمبراطورية لتلقي مكافأة النصر التي وعد بها الإمبراطور. ومع ذلك، فإن المكافأة الوحيدة التي عادت كانت <الحق في اختيار شريك الزواج>. كخيار أفضل، أشار آشا إلى "دوق كارلايل هافن"، وهو الأمير الأول الذي تم حرمانه مؤخرًا من لقب ولي العهد. إذا تم رفضها، كانت تنوي الحصول على نفقة من الإمبراطور... "ماركيز بيرباز. سأقبل عرض زواجك". وعلى عكس التوقعات، قبل دوق كارلايل اختيار آشا. وعود بدعم هائل لبيرفاز...!
description.en:
The lord of Pervaz, who led the 28-year war to victory, Asha Pervaz. 

For Pervaz, who was devastated by the long war, Asha heads to the imperial family to receive the victory reward promised by the emperor.  However, the only reward that came back was the "right to choose a marriage partner." 

As the best choice, Asha pointed out the Duke of Carlisle Haven, the first prince who had recently been deprived of the title of crown prince.  If she was refused, she intended to receive compensation from the emperor... 

"Marquise Perbaz. I will accept your marriage proposal." 

Contrary to expectations, the Duke of Carlisle accepted Asha's choice.  Promising tremendous support for Pervaz...!

---
After winning a long war, Asha Pervaz is expecting the emperor to compensate her with money. Unlike her expectations though, the emperor asks Asha to choose her own husband from a list of nobles. Asha chooses Duke Carlisle Haven, the emperor’s eldest son and former crown prince. Asha expects him to object and pay an alimony instead, but the duke actually agrees to marry her! He even promises to help Asha rebuild Pervaz. What does the duke really want? And will Asha get what she wants without getting embroiled in the growing royal conspiracy?
description.fr: Après avoir mis fin à la longue guerre contre les Lurs, Asha Pervaz, Seigneure des terres de Pervaz, se rend au palais impérial dans l'espoir d'obtenir la récompense promise par l'Empereur. Mais contrairement à ses attentes, Asha ne se voit offrir que le droit de choisir un époux. Fine stratège, elle choisit le Duc Carlisle Haven, fils aîné de l'empereur et prince héritier temporairement privé de son autorité, pensant que celui-ci refusera et lui versera en échange une compensation financière. Mais contre toute attente, le Duc accepte de l'épouser. Il lui promet de lui fournir les matériaux nécessaires à la reconstruction de Pervaz si Asha l'aide à récupérer le trône qui lui revient de droit.
description.id: Setelah kematian ayah dan kakak-kakaknya melawan suku barbar, Asha Pervaz turun tangan untuk menggantikan mereka. Kemenangan berhasil ia raih, namun imbalan yang ia terima hanya cemoohan rakyat dan “hak memilih calon suami”, alih-alih hadiah uang untuk membangun kembali wilayahnya. Sadar bahwa Kaisar mempermainkannya, Asha memilih Carlisle Haven Evaristo, sang putra mahkota kekaisaran yang dicabut haknya akibat skandal besar, untuk menjadi suaminya! Asha yakin Carlisle akan menolaknya, namun…
description.ko: 28년간의 전쟁을 승리로 이끈 페르바즈의 영주, '아샤 페르바즈'. 긴 전쟁으로 황폐해진 페르바즈를 위해 아샤는 황제가 약속한 승전 보상을 받으러 황실로 향한다.   하지만 돌아온 보상은 고작 <결혼 상대 선택권>.  최선의 선택으로 얼마 전 황태자 위를 박탈당한 1황자, '칼라일 헤이븐 공작'을 지목한 아샤. 거절하면 황제에게 위자료를 지급받을 생각이었으나…  "페르바즈 변경백. 그대의 청혼을 받아들이겠다."  예상과 다르게 칼라일 공작은 아샤의 선택을 받아들였다. 페르바즈에 대한 엄청난 지원까지 약속하면서…!
description.th: อาชา เปอร์เวซ ลอร์ดแห่งเปอร์เวซ ผู้นำชัยชยะมาสู่สงครามที่กินเวลายาวนานกว่า 28 ปี อาชามุ่งหน้าไปยังพระราชวังเพื่อรับรางวัลแห่งชัยชนะที่จักรพรรดิได้ให้คำมั่นไว้ โดยมีจุดมุ่งหมายเพื่อนำมาบูรณะดินแดนเปอร์เวซ ซึ่งถูกจักรวรรดิทอดทิ้งจากสงครามที่ยืดเยื้อ แต่ทว่า รางวัลเดียวที่อาชาได้รับกลับเป็น <การเลือกคู่แต่งงาน> อาชาตัดสินใจเลือกมกุฎราชกุมาร ดยุกแห่งคาร์ไลล์ ฮาเว่น ผู้ซึ่งถูกปลดจากตำแหน่งมกุฎราชกุมารเมื่อไม่นานมานี้ ถ้าเธอถูกปฏิเสธ เธอก็จะได้รับรางวัลอย่างงามจากจักรพรรดิ แต่ว่า… “มาร์คกราฟแห่งเปอร์เวซ ข้ายอมรับคำขอแต่งงานของเจ้า” ทุกอย่างกลับไม่เป็นไปตามที่คาดไว้ ดยุกแห่งคาร์ไลล์ ฮาเว่นเลือกที่ยอมรับคำขอแต่งงานของอาชา และเขายังสัญญาที่จะให้การสนับสนุนเปอร์เวซอย่างเต็มที่อีกด้วย
description.tr: Perbaz’ın 28 yıl süren savaşı zafere taşıyan lordu ‘Asya Pervaz’. Uzun süren savaşta harap olan Pervaz için Asya, imparator tarafından vaat edilen zafer ödülünü almak üzere imparatorluk ailesine gider. Ancak kendisine geri dönen tek ödül <Evlilik eşi seçme hakkı> olmuştur. Asya en iyi seçenek olarak, yakın zamanda veliaht prens ünvanından mahrum bırakılan ilk prens olan ‘Colail Haven Dükü’nü işaret etti. Eğer reddedilirse, imparatordan nafaka almaya niyetliydi… “Markiz Pervaz. Evlilik teklifinizi kabul ediyorum.” Beklentilerin aksine Colail Dükü, Asya’nın teklifini kabul etti. Pervaz’a büyük destek sözü verdi!..
description.vi: Lãnh địa Pervaz đã bị tàn phá bởi một cuộc chiến tranh. Và vĩ lãnh chúa mới của lãnh địa Pervaz này chính là Asha Pervaz. Cô được hoàng đế ban thưởng cho chiến thắng của mình. Nhưng người gặp cô lại chế giễu cô là ‘nàng công chúa man rợ’ và thật là một đề nghị vô lý khi trao quyền chọn bạn đời làm phần thưởng cho chiến thắng. Asha phải đưa ra lựa chọn tốt nhất ngay cả trong hoàn cảnh này. “Vậy…công tước Carlyle Haven đi” Cô chọn ra đại hoàng tử, người đứng đầu danh sách quý tộc và cách đây không lâu đã gây ra một vụ bê bối lớn và bị tước đoạt danh hiệu đại hoàng tử. Nếu anh ta tức giận và từ chối, cô sẽ nhanh chóng đòi bồi thường sau đó, nhưng đâu ngờ rằng Carlyle lại chấp nhận sự lựa chọn của cô. “Anh mong muốn gì ở tôi?” “Đừng bận tậm đến việc tôi làm ở Pervaz. Đừng mong rằng được đối xử như một người vợ và cũng đừng nghĩ đến việc dính líu đến phe đối lập của tôi. Và khi tôi yêu cầu thì đừng nói linh tinh gì cả, chỉ cần ký vào tờ giấy ly hôn là được” Đó là một giao dịch không có gì là không tốt đối với Asha. Cô nắm lấy tay của kẻ ngạo mạn kia mà ngay cả hoàng đế cũng coi thường. Một nụ cười đầy sức quyến rũ nở trên môi anh. “Phu nhân, sau này xin được giúp đỡ”
description.zh:
事业型男女主被迫联姻，
强强联合收获爱与权力
在长达28年的战争中，佩尔瓦兹的领主“阿西娅·佩尔瓦兹”成功地率领众人取得了胜利。为了重建因长期战争而荒芜的佩尔瓦兹，阿西娅前往皇室领取皇帝承诺的胜仗奖励。但等待她却只是区区<择偶权>，而无任何实质性的奖励。想到佩尔瓦兹的百姓连今年冬天都可能撑不过去，阿西娅只好选择刚失去皇太子身份的卡莱尔公爵作为结婚对象…“既然皇室不想让我们好过，那么就拉你们一起下水”。
description.pt-br: Depois de vencer uma longa guerra, Asha Pervaz esperava que o imperador a compensasse com dinheiro. Ao contrário de suas expectativas, o imperador ordenou que Asha escolhesse um marido dentre uma lista de nobres. Ela escolheu o Duque Carlisle Haven, filho mais velho do imperador e antigo príncipe herdeiro. Asha esperava que ele fosse contra isso e, ao invés, pagasse uma pensão para ela , mas o Duque concordou em se casar com ela! Ele até prometeu ajudar a reconstruir Pervaz. O que o Duque realmente quer?  E Asha vai conseguir o que quer sem se envolver na crescente conspiração real?
description.zh-hk: 為了拯救因漫長戰爭而荒廢的領地「菲爾巴茲」，亞莎前往皇室向皇帝要求當初所承諾的戰勝補償。然而，她卻只獲得了「結婚對象選擇權」。權衡之下，亞莎認為最好的人選是不久前被剝奪皇太子地位的卡拉爾．海本公爵，假如被拒絕了，就能從皇帝那裡得到精神賠償… 「菲爾巴茲伯爵，我接受妳的求婚。」 出乎意料的是，卡拉爾公爵接受了亞莎的選擇，還承諾提供菲爾巴茲龐大的支援…！

Miyaji Miyuki (16) moved away when she was little, not long after going on a spree of proposing to several different girls in kindergarten.

Years later, she returns to her hometown and transfers to a new high school, where she is forced to reckon with her past...

The main protagonist, Ariake Subaru, was bullied and was chosen as a player of the “Rainbow” rank, which is neither gold, silver, nor copper. He acquired the skill to freely manipulate blood, and his life and position changed completely. As he continues to fight every day, he gradually earns the title as a “Savior” who will save the world.
description.ja: 異界からの脅威に対抗する超人的存在"プレイヤー"。イジメられっ子の透晴は、既存の金・銀・銅のどれでもない、"虹"ランクのプレイヤーに選ばれる。それまでの立ち位置から一変、世界を救う"救世主"となる！

description.en: The Sage Dwight, he along with the Hero defeated the Demon Lord who sank the world into darkness. However, they were falsely accused of becoming the next Demon Lords because of his power, and were thrown to The Valley of the Dead to die... But though his flesh has rotten away, he lives on as a skeleton because of his grudge against the world. Dwight has vowed to deny that wrong world, and with a power that surpasses even the Demon King of the past, and also leading countless Skeletons he's going to start an all out war...!
description.ja:
かつて勇者と共に世界を闇に沈めた魔王を討伐した英雄、賢者ドワイト。
しかし、その力から次代の魔王になるつもりだと無実の罪を着せられ、
死者の谷へ落とされ命を落とす…。
しかし、肉が腐り落ちるも、この世への執念からスケルトンとして
生き永らえていたドワイトは、この間違った世界を否定する事を誓い、
かつての魔王をも凌駕する力で無数のアンデッドを率い、侵略戦争を開始する…！

---
- [Web Novel (Raw)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0651fj)
description.pt-br:
O Sábio Dwight, ele junto com o Herói derrotou o Lorde Demônio que afundou o mundo na escuridão. No entanto, eles foram falsamente acusados ​​de se tornarem os próximos Lordes Demônios por causa de seu poder, e foram jogados no Vale dos Mortos para morrer…

Mas embora sua carne tenha apodrecido, 
ele vive como um esqueleto por causa de seu rancor contra o mundo. Dwight jurou negar esse mundo errado, e com um poder que supera até mesmo o Rei Demônio do passado, e também liderando incontáveis ​​esqueletos. ele vai começar uma guerra total...!

description.en:
“Even though I was supposed to have been rejected for marriage once…!?”
The Dragon Saintess, tasked with caring for the black dragon “Gramvint,” who protects the Kingdom of Elvasti, is the official fiancée of the kingdom’s prince. The current Dragon Saintess, “Ludia,” has dedicated her life since childhood to taking care of the enormous dragon that resides in a giant cage. She was also engaged to the prince, “Edik.”

However, one day, “Edik” suddenly summoned “Ludia” and informed her of her dismissal as the Dragon Saintess and the annulment of their engagement. To her shock, the new Dragon Saintess was her stepsister, “Leila.” What’s more, “Edik” told her that her next destination would be marriage to the Black General, “Wilfried.” But “Wilfried” rejected the marriage, saying, “You and I are not a good match”…!?
Kenma and Kuroo help Hinata on a mission of love... A mission to find out just where in the world Kageyama-kun gets his Boyfriend Power from!

description.en: Professor Noah Minami Umberbach is not your average archeologist! For one, he's prone to whipping out his gun and blowing up stuff to make dramatic entrances. But that's just his eccentric nature. He's actually a man on a mission. A mission that may very well be the most important mission of all time. And he's dragging history-hating student Kotobuki Mirai along for the ride!

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスター リバースト

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist leaving his town where people and Pokémon live in peace together in order to locate his father. The hero doesn’t know much about his father besides the fact that he is a powerful swordsman. On his journey, the protagonist meets up with new friends and foes and discovers the power of Burst Heart Crystals, these crystals entrap a Pokémon inside and allow humans transform themselves partly into them in order to take advantage of their special abilities and attacks.

altTitles.en: Rising from the Slum City of Reincarnation in Another World ~ Gathering, Hunting, and Living a Slow Life by Eating

description.en: At the age of 6, Ed, a boy suddenly recalls that he is a reincarnated individual from modern Japan. However, his current life unfolds in the slums of another world! Struggling with a poverty-stricken existence in his daily life, he shares his living space with and eats with his childhood friend, a girl named Miinya. Their daily fare consists mainly of 'boiled beans.' Ed, drawing upon his knowledge from modern Japan, discovers edible wild plants and leaves suitable for making tea to improve their dietary situation. In pursuit of a slow life, Ed's life of gathering and hunting begins!
description.ja: 自分が現代日本からの転生者であることを突然思い出した6歳の少年・エド。けれど、彼が現在生活しているのは異世界のスラム街だった!?　日々の暮らしにも困る貧乏生活で、幼馴染で同居している少女・ミーニャと毎日食べているのは「豆の水煮」ばっかり…。エドは現代日本の知識を活かして、食べられる野草やお茶になる葉っぱを見つけ、食生活の改善を図るが!?　スローライフを満喫するため、エドの採取・猟生活が始まる！
description.pt-br: Aos 6 anos de idade, Ed, um menino, de repente se lembra de que é um indivíduo reencarnado do Japão moderno. No entanto, sua vida atual se desenrola nos cortiços de outro mundo! Lutando com uma existência empobrecida em sua vida diária, ele compartilha seu espaço de vida e se alimenta com sua amiga de infância, uma garota chamada Miinya. Sua comida diária consiste principalmente de 'feijões cozidos'. Ed, aproveitando seus conhecimentos do Japão moderno, descobre plantas silvestres comestíveis e folhas adequadas para fazer chá para melhorar sua situação alimentar. Em busca de uma vida tranquila, a vida de Ed de coletar e caçar começa!

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

altTitles.ja: ヘブンバーンズレッド公式４コマ

description.en: A humorous 4-koma series about the daily activities of the Seraph Squadron that helps us to know a bit more about their personalities and outlook on life.
description.vi: Loạt manga 4 khung tranh về sinh hoạt thường nhật của các chiến binh Quân đoàn Seraph theo phong cách đáng yêu và hài hước, giúp ta biết thêm một phần về tính cách và quan điểm sống của họ.

altTitles.en: Stepmother's Guide

description.en:
Yamazaki Misaki passed away due to illness, but when she awoke, she found that she had been reborn as a character in a manga she had read before her death — the abusive, wicked stepmother of the young protagonist.  

Only remembering this the day before her wedding, there was already no way to escape. Determined to treat her stepson well, upon meeting him, she found the boy extremely adorable! 

As she worked to raise the child well with her memories to aid her, the attitude of her cold husband began to change?!
description.ja: 病気でこの世を去ることになった山崎美咲。ところが目を覚ますと、生前読んでいたマンガの世界に転生していた。しかも、幼少期の主人公を虐待する悪辣な継母キャラとして……。前世の記憶を取り戻したのは結婚式の前日で、もはや逃げようもない。とにかく虐待しないようにしよう、と決意して対面した継子は――めちゃくちゃ可愛いんですけどー!!!　ついつい前世の知識を駆使して子育てに奮闘しているうちに、超絶冷たかった旦那様の態度も変わってきて……!?　義息子のためならチートにもなっちゃう！　愛とオタクの力で異世界の育児事情を変える、異色の子育てファンタジー、開幕！

altTitles.ja: ファイアーエムブレム エンゲージ

description.ja: 人の姿をした神竜・リュールは、記憶を失った状態で長き眠りから目を覚ます。人々はリュールを、1000年前に世界を脅かす邪竜と戦った英雄だと言うが…。期待を込めて崇められ戸惑う彼に、再び戦いと策略の影が迫る――。

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.ru: Пробравшись на невольничий корабль, Юлиан отправляется на континент вместе с сотней рабов, жаждущих свободы... Но что ждёт его впереди?!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

description.en:
Azumi is a manga series that concerns a young woman brought up as part of a team of assassins, charged with killing three warlords that threaten Feudal Japan with an agenda of war and bloodshed.  
  


---

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿

altTitles.en: The Jack the Ripper Case Files
Record of Ragnarok: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.ru: Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok Curious Tale: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

description.en:
In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0212)
description.ja: 『終末のワルキューレ』第4回戦人類代表ジャック・ザ・リッパー。霧の都ロンドンを、恐怖のどん底に落とし、人類が応援することさえ躊躇した狂喜の殺人紳士に隠された真実とは？

altTitles.en: Bloodline: The Illusory Noble Demon

description.en: Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.

altTitles.en: Reborn as a Scholar

description.en:
A martial artist, claiming himself to be a "murderer" is defeated by a suicide attack in battle and is reborn as a first born child to a local lord. Having a fresh start, a warm family and a little sister to protect - he decides to become a better person in his new life.

Setelah bereinkarnasi menjadi anak bernama Hwang Junwoo, dia menjalani hidup yang berbeda dengan kehidupan sebelumnya. seiring berjalannya waktu, dia melatih ilmu bela dirinya agar menjadi pendekar terhebat, namun ada banyak pihak yang tidak senang dengan keluarganya. mampukah dia menghadapi segala cobaan di kehidupannya yang baru?

description.ja:
7回の夜を経て天下一になった男、「趙・俊宇」。 彼を処断しようとする連中に追われて、長い戦いの末、天池で死を迎えた。 これで全てが終わったと思った瞬間、目を覚ましたら赤ん坊になっていた!！ 天下一の黄金を蓄えている大商人の長男に生まれ変わった「趙・俊宇」は、 辛かった前世とは違って、暖かい家族のもとに育つ。 「趙・俊宇」は武功を立てながら、学士としての人生を進んでいく。 新しい縁と出会い、前世での縁との関係を整理しながら、「趙・俊宇」はある境地に至るが・・・

description.ko:
일곱 번의 밤을 거쳐 천하제일이 된 사내, 황준우.
오랜 싸움 끝에 천지(天地)에서 죽음을 맞이했다.

헌데 눈을 떠 보니 갓난아기!
집안은 천하제일의 황금을 축적한 만금장!
고되기만 하였던 전생과 달리 금수저를 물고 태어나 버렸다!

신명나게 인생을 즐기는 한 사내의 일대기... 가 될 뻔 했으나,
인생은 그리 호락호락하지 않다!

"그런데 아버지, 도대체 공부는...... 왜 시키시는 겁니까?"

Мастер боевых искусств, заклеймивший себя как «убийца», был побеждён в битве в результате самоубийственной атаки и переродился в теле первенца в семье местного владыки. Получив возможность начать всё заново, имея любящую семью и младшую сестрёнку, которую нужно защищать, он решает стать лучшим человеком в своей новой жизни.

altTitles.en: Otherside Picnic

altTitles.vi: Dã ngoại nơi mặt sau của thế giới

description.en: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.
description.ja: ネット上で実話怪談として語られる存在が出現する、この現実と隣り合わせで謎だらけの<裏世界>。研究とお金稼ぎ、そして大切な人を捜すため、鳥子と空魚は非日常へと足を踏み入れる。女子ふたり怪異探検サバイバル!!
description.ru: Сюжет разворачивается в современном мире, но в нем существуют двери, которые пропускают людей "на другую сторону", где оживают городские легенды и странные истории из Интернета. Студентка колледжа Сораво Камикоши находит одну из таких дверей и идет исследовать Потусторонье. Она почти погибает, когда ее спасает Торико Нишина. Торико - загадочная девушка, которая умело обращается с ружьем и кого-то ищет в Потусторонье. Вместе они начинают исследовать мир за дверями.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

title.en: I Want to Kill the Yandere Prince Everyday

altTitles.zh: 每天都想让病娇王子社死

altTitles.zh-ro: Meitian Du Xiang Rang Bing Jiao Wangzi She Si

altTitles.es-la: Quiero que el príncipe yandere muera todos los días

altTitles.en: I Want the Dark and Obsessive Prince To Suffer Humiliation Every Day

description.en: Trouble brews for a sucker for pretty faces! A dirt-poor commoner and ray of sunshine, Jiang Jiao Jiao(straight guy) falls for Zhong Ming Yu's (male) looks at first sight! After an unexpected accident, the once cold and aloof young lord has transformed into a dainty, fragile ["Little Sister Lin"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lin_Daiyu), even using his good looks to win the affections of the other party!! However, as their relationship deepens, Jiang Jiao Jiao begins to uncover Ming Yu’s dark, obsessive tendencies and a massive family secret spanning two generations...
description.zh: 颜狗大危机！阳光土狗蒋骄骄(直男)对钟悯玉（男）的脸一见钟情! 一场意外，让原本高不可攀的冷面贵公子摇身一变成为撒娇易碎的“林妹妹”，还利用自己的美貌获得对方垂青！！ 可随着交往渐深，蒋骄骄逐渐发现钟悯玉的病娇本性，还有背后藏家族和两代人的巨大秘密…

altTitles.th: แฟนสาวแค่ 7 วัน

altTitles.en: Girlfriend limited to 7 days.

description.en:
A yuri romantic comedy centered on a temporary relationship between a gal and an honor student. 

The story begins when Manatsu, a gal who is on the verge of repeating a grade, starts receiving tutoring from Sumie, an honor student. Manatsu loves shoujo manga and romantic gossip but has the vague that having a boyfriend somehow doesn't fit her. 

When she casually brings this up, Sumie suggests, "Why not try starting with just the form?" and offers "How about dating me for just 7 days?"

altTitles.en: Poor Little Sister

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
description.pl: Biedna młodsza siostrzyczka, która zakochała się w swoim bracie
description.vi: Cô em gái đáng thương phải lòng anh trai mình
description.pt-br: Pobre irmãzinha que arma seu onii-chan

title.en: Ao no Hana, Utsuwa no Mori

altTitles.ja-ro: Ao no Hana, Utsuwa no Mori

altTitles.en: The Blue Flowers, and the Ceramic Forest

altTitles.th: แต่งเติมลวดลายในรัก

description.en:
Aoko is a ceramic painter at Hasami Wares Pottery, when suddenly an unfriendly and unapproachable man named Tatsuki arrives from overseas. Rejecting her way of life by telling her he isn't interested in painted ceramics, Aoko feels dejected, but can't help but be drawn to Tatsuki's ceramics…  
  
This is a mature love story of a man and woman, both fascinated by ceramics.
description.zh: 青之花 器之森漫画 ，小玉ユキ为大人献上的爱情故事， 陶瓷器与充满坡道的小镇、波佐见—— 对「器」怀着热爱的男女、 在这个小镇相遇…！？

altTitles.en: The Jeweller's Maid

description.en:
The jewelry store Rohstein is an unconventional shop where “a maid sells jewels”.

Off of the main street, the shop is visited by an elderly gentleman, a noble, an actress, a poor student, and all sorts of people who have heard the rumors of it. When they hold the jewels selected by the maid, their own lives also begin to shine.

A tale spun by jewels and people.

With dainty illustrations, a jewel-bestowing short story series.
description.ja:
宝石商「ローシュタイン」は“メイドが宝石を売る”一風変わった品揃えのお店。
大通りから外れたその店には、老紳士、貴族、女優、貧乏学生と噂を聞きつけたさまざまな人が訪れる。
メイドが選んだ宝石を手にしたとき、彼ら自身の人生もまた輝きだす。
宝石と人が紡ぐ物語。
ーー繊細なイラストで贈る珠玉の連作短編。

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!
description.vi:
Truyện kể về thời kỳ Tam quốc tranh bá nổi tiếng trong lịch sử Trung Quốc. Điểm đặc biệt ở đây là nhân vật trung tâm của truyện không phải là Tào Tháo, Lưu Bị hay Tôn Quyền như ta thường thấy ở các bộ truyện nói về thời kì này mà là Tư Mã Ý - người mà sau này đã cùng với gia tộc mình đánh bại tất cả các anh hùng khác, gom thiên hạ về thành 1 mối, chấm dứt 1 thời kỳ dài loạn lạc. 

Truyện mở đầu bằng cơn ác mộng mà Tư Mã Ý vẫn thường gặp: 1 người đàn ông trên ngai vàng phế truất ngôi vị của hoàng đế, bên ngoài bất chấp đám đông binh lính bao vây tấn công cùng bao nhiêu thương tích mà 1 người bình thường không thể chịu đựng nổi, tên tù vượt ngục vẫn bước từng bước từng bước một vào điện đòi món nợ máu với người đàn ông đó. Đó chỉ là cơn ác mộng hay là 1 điềm báo? Không ai nói được kể cả Tư Mã Ý.

Nhưng cũng có ai có thời gian để quan tâm đến truyện ấy trong thời loạn lạc này chứ. Dù cố né tránh, cuối cùng dòng họ Tư Mã cũng phải bước vào vòng xoáy chiến tranh, và sự xuất hiện của họ đã làm thay đổi cả dòng lịch sử....

altTitles.ja: 三億円事件奇譚 モンタージ

description.en:
One day, 10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato, and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."  
Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later, Yamato's father is found dead, and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident, but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later, Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents, and resolves to take action.

altTitles.ja: ミスミさんは見透かせない

altTitles.en: Misumi-san can't see through

description.en: A romantic comedy about Yuri Tsuguto, who has clairvoyance but isn’t good at it, and Misumi Mitsuhashi, a girl who likes strange things. One day, when Yuri looks at Misumi’s back, he notices that her jacket is transparent and behind it is the message “If anyone can read this, come to the astronomy clubroom after school.” When he goes to the clubroom and explains his clairvoyance ability, Misumi becomes excited and asks “Why don’t you let me study you?”
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Yuri Tsuguto, que tem clarividência, mas não é bom nisso, e Misumi Mitsuhashi, uma garota que gosta de coisas estranhas. Um dia, quando Yuri olha para as costas de Misumi, ele percebe que sua jaqueta é transparente e atrás dela está a mensagem "Se alguém puder ler isso, venha para a sala do clube de astronomia depois da escola." Quando ele vai para a sala do clube e explica sua habilidade de clarividência, Misumi fica animada e pergunta "Por que você não me deixa estudar você?"

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

altTitles.id: Antagonis Level 99~ Aku Memang Bos Rahasia, Tapi Aku Bukanlah Raja Iblis~

altTitles.th: ยัยตัวร้าย เลเวล99

altTitles.vi: Nữ Phụ Phản Diện Lv99! Tôi Là Trùm Cuối Nhưng Không Phải Là Ma Vương!

altTitles.ru: Злодейка 99 уровня: Я могу быть скрытым боссом, но я не Король демонов

altTitles.fr: Personnage au niveau 99 - Bien que je sois en réalité le boss caché, je ne suis pas le Roi Démon

description.en:
I reincarnated as the "Villainess Eumiella" from an RPG Otome game. In the main story, Eumiella is merely a side character, but after the ending, she re-enters the story as the Hidden Boss, a character boasting high stats on par with the heroes! 

Lighting a fire in my gamer's soul, and taking advantage of being left on my own in my parent's territory, I trained, trained, and trained! As a result of my training… by the time I enrolled in the academy, I managed to reach level 99. 

Though I had planned to live out my days as inconspicuously and peacefully as possible, soon after entering the school, I'm suspected by the Heroine and Love Interests of being the "Demon Lord"…?  
  
Based on a popular web novel of seeking a peaceful life, a fantasy story of the strongest villainess!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/46067)
description.id:
Aku bereinkarnasi menjadi antagonis "Dolkness Eumelia" dari gim otome RPG. Di cerita utamanya, Eumelia hanyalah seorang karakter sampingan, tapi setelah ending, ia memasuki cerita lagi dengan menjadi bos rahasia, menjadi karakter yang mempunyai status lebih tinggi daripada pahlawan!!  
  
Memantik jiwa gamer-ku, lalu mengambil kesempatan karena ditinggal oleh keluargaku di wilayah mereka, aku berlatih! Berlatih! Lalu pada akhir pelatihanku saat aku baru memasuki akademi, ternyata levelku mencapai 99.  
  
Walaupun aku sudah membuat rencana untuk hidup tanpa mencolok dan damai, beberapa saat setelah masuk sekolah, aku disangka "Raja Iblis" oleh si Heroine dan Para Target Cintanya …?  
  
Diangkat dari Web Novel yang populer yang mencari kehidupan damai, sebuah cerita fantasi tentang antagonis terkuat!
description.vi: Yumiera Dorkness là con gái của một Bá tước, bị mọi người và cả chính cha mẹ mình ghẻ lạnh chỉ vì màu tóc, nguyên nhân là do Ma Vương tóc cũng màu đen giống hệt cô. Một hôm cô chợt nhớ ra được kí ức kiếp trước và cô đã trọng sinh vào một Otome game, cô không trọng sinh vào nữ chính mà lại là nữ phụ phản diện – người mà sau này trở thành trùm cuối của game!? Đây chính là một cuộc hành trình kể về một cô gái chống lại số phận nghiệt ngã, sống một cuộc đời yên bình và tránh trở thành trùm cuối để rồi dính bad end!

description.en:
A young man set forth to avenge his master, a once powerful martial artist who was betrayed by his own men and barely escaped with his life. Armed with his master's supreme martial art techniques, he is ready to bring terror and wreak havoc among the murim. But before he even got started, he learns that the ones who had betrayed his master are already dead… Erm, so what happens now?

Юный мастер боевых искусств, следуя завету своего почившего учителя, отправляется вершить возмездие его вероломным предателям. Напичканный до зубов священными боевыми техниками самого Верховного Крушителя, он попутно планирует воссоздать великую армию и начать сеять хаос и разрушения. Вот только оказалось, что предатели давным-давно умерли. Накрылись медным тазом планы мести, а с ними и мечты о геройских похождениях, тут и вебочке конец…

There Are Beasts

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

description.en:
The story begins in Europe, during the first years of the XX century. On a background of intrigues, machinations and a Europe that is going strait toward World War I, three kids meet at a strict conservatory in Germany. Julius met Isaac at the famous Orpheus' Window and later in another event met Klaus there. The legend told that two lovers met at Orpheus' Window would end in unhappiness. But Julius met two different persons, and they didn't know Julius' secret. In fact, Julius is a woman who's forced to dress up and pretend to be a guy. But she isn't the only one who has secrets. Klaus, for example, is Russian. Is he a communist spy? Then the whirlwind of fate began.

Note: Has a gaiden known as Collage. Additional gaiden were written by Ikeda, but illustrated by her longtime assistant Erika Miyamoto.

altTitles.ja: いとこのお姉ちゃんに甘えちゃう？

altTitles.en: I'll Be Spoiled by My Big Sis Cousin?

description.en: Masato Ooizumi just entered high school and he finds himself staying with a relative. Living there is his "big sister cousin" who's being way too close with him!?
description.ja: 高校進学を機に、親戚の家に居候することになった男子高校生・大泉将人。良い大学に行くために真面目に勉強したいけど、勝手に家庭教師を名乗り出た“いとこのお姉ちゃん”がセクシーすぎて、全然集中できなくて…!?
description.es-la: Una Comedia Romántica entre Primos, Un chico que apenas comenzó el Instituto y Una Onee-chan que ya va en la Universidad, esto definitivamente te encantará~

description.en: The stage is the eve of the French Revolution. There is the commoner Gideon, who wants to save the impoverished country side-by-side with the members of the Estates General. Then there is the aristocrat, Georges, who will use any means to achieve his purpose. A man who wants to change the country, and a man who wants to destroy it. Both begin their journey forward. Will their joint efforts of love and hatred, justice and evil lead them to a hell of bloodshed, or an ideal future?

A woman identical to me appears in my dreams, crying.  

"Who are you?"  

For three years, Shunaelle, the Demon King of the North, has been haunted by the same dream, growing curious about the woman and deciding to track her down.  

The truth? She’s a fragment of Shunaelle’s soul, cast away into the human realm.  

When Shunaelle tries to absorb the fragment back into herself, the woman resists.  

『I don’t want to be absorbed!』  

Instead, she makes a plea:  
If you want me back, live my life—a life filled with regret—and make it right.

altTitles.en: The Gourmet

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: The Hunter Wants to Live Quietly

altTitles.en: The Hunter Wants to Live in Peace

description.en: Hunter Cha Euijae, sent to seal a rift over the West Sea, was flung out after closing it. When he regain consciousness, he found himself in a garbage dump—eight years in the future. Starving, he stumbled into a hangover soup restaurant and realized the world had changed. Now, disaster alerts warn of rift openings, slime ASMR videos are trending, and hunters livestream A-rank sword unboxings. Instead of the looming apocalypse, the future is oddly peaceful, leaving Cha Euijae feeling empty. Deciding to leave his hunter days behind, he chooses to work part-time at the restaurant. But his quiet new life takes a turn when he meets a mysterious figure in a gas mask…

altTitles.ja: ガンダムエグザ　ブイエス

description.en:
Gundam EXA VS (ガンダム EXA VS) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by Kōichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2014 to be tied in with the arcade Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Maxi Boost. It's the sequel to the previous manga series, Gundam EXA.

Some time after the events of Gundam EXA, Sthesia Awar informs Leos Alloy that she discovered a new GA data cluster from a computer outside of Jupiter X. The two dive into the new data and find themselves in the Universal Century, during the attack on Side 7. However, after entering the colony, they find that the inside was in ruins, and the RX-78-02 Gundam has been destroyed before it could be activated by Amuro Ray.

altTitles.pt-br: Um Novo Aventureiro Velho Demais é Treinado ao Extremo por uma Equipe de Elite e se Torna Invencível

description.en:
It is common knowledge that it is best to become an adventurer when you are as young as possible, because the magical power that is the basis of an adventurer's strength will hardly grow if you don't train it while you are young. But this man, Rick Gladiator, who became an adventurer when he was over thirty years old, had the combat power of an S-rank adventurer, the highest rank in the world. In fact, Rick has lived an unimaginable life with the members of the legendary Orihalcon Fist, a party of the continent's strongest adventurers. From dragons to vampires, Rick's fighting prowess, trained by his literally "monster" mentors, allows him to defeat elite adventurers one after another who try to underestimate him.
___
**Character Designer:** [Tea](https://mangadex.org/author/71d4c549-2476-4803-a9c2-c48a15cc0fd4)
description.ja: 漫画を担当するのは、週刊少年ジャンプにて「レディ・ジャスティス」を連載していた、荻野ケン！ド迫力のバトルアクションと、怒涛のギャグ！　魂のこもったキャラが縦横無尽に活躍する漫画版をお楽しみください！！　『冒険者になるのはできるだけ若いうちがいい』しかしその男、なんと30歳を過ぎてから冒険者を目指したリック・グラディアートルは、新米ながら最高位[Ｓランク]並みの戦闘力を有していた。　伝説のパーティ「オリハルコン・フィスト」──ドラゴンからヴァンパイアまで、文字通り「モンスター」級の師匠たちに鍛え上げられた戦闘力でなめてかかってくるエリート冒険者を次々にねじ伏せていく。「出遅れ…？何歳から冒険者やったって何歳から新しいこと始めたって…いいだろ！」
description.vi:
Rick Gladiator - Làm lễ tân ở Guild suốt 14 năm nhưng vẫn ấp ủ giấc mơ được trở thành Mạo Hiểm Giả. Và ở tuổi 30, anh đã nghỉ việc để theo đuổi con đường đó.
Với người luống tuổi và khởi đầu muộn như Rick, sẽ quá là khó khăn cho anh. Nhưng rồi anh có được cuộc gặp gỡ định mệnh và được huấn luyện bởi Hội Nhóm Mạo Hiểm Giả mạnh nhất Lục Địa - Cường Quyền Orihalcon.
description.pt-br: É de conhecimento geral que é melhor se tornar um aventureiro quando você é o mais jovem possível, porque o poder mágico que é a base da força de um aventureiro dificilmente crescerá se você não o treinar enquanto é jovem. Mas esse homem, Rick Gladiator, que se tornou um aventureiro quando tinha mais de trinta anos, tinha o poder de combate de um aventureiro de classificação S, a classificação mais alta do mundo. Na verdade, Rick viveu uma vida inimaginável com os membros do lendário Orihalcon Fist, um grupo dos aventureiros mais fortes do continente. De dragões a vampiros, a destreza de luta de Rick, treinada por seus mentores literalmente "monstros", permite que ele derrote aventureiros de elite um após o outro que tentam subestimá-lo.

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". 
What is her daily life like...?!

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.
